Articles.Content: Floor 2849: A laptop computer. On the screen is a graph comparing the amount of floors in this building to the number of posts in the Let's Count thread. The building is winning.

Fllor 2850: You can see the "Ban the user above you!" tower.

It's 1131 post high top gets lost somewhere in clouds, so you have to hold your hat.
Floor 2851: you see a plane is flying to you. I suggest you RUN AWAY NOW.
Floor 2852: While the player was running up, the plane has flown away.
Floor 2853: A medical floor where they perform surgery to give you new hips and knee joints to replace the ones you have worn out from all the climbing.
Floor 2854: Rockeplanes - plane-rocket hybrids. Run. Run away now.
Floor 2855: A fusion reactor. You can see someone is overriding it.
Floor 2856: Confusion reactor. It confuses everyone below.
Floor 2857: SCP site-1.
Floor 2858: Depleted D-staff.
Floor 2858: That one SCP that's the tank that attacks anyone who acts aggressive around it. You very carefully slip past it.

Floor 2859

you wonder why the building is this tall and still standing

Floor 2860: The walls are gone, this part of the building is being held up by the upper part in orbit. You do some quick math and find that the building is 40040 feet tall!

Spoiler

2860 (floors) x 14 (average height of a building's floor) = 40040 (height in feet)
Floor 2861: An Engineer Gaming
Floor 2862: Pootis bird and Hoovy
Floor 2863: Empty.
Floor 2864: Conformation that things will get better.
Floor 2865: The things are so bad that there is no even a chance that they can't get better.
Floor 2866: They are playing the song "Things can only get better"  by D:REAM.
Floor 2867: a big sign reads "This space for sale or rent."

Floor 2868: You find yourself singing.

Trailer for sale or rent
Rooms to let, fifty cents
No phone, no pool, no pets
I ain't got no cigarettes
Floor 2869: A piece of 2D dimension and a piece of 4D dimension.
Floor 2870: Moebius stairway.
Floor 2871: Escher stairway.
Floor 2872: The Color Blue
